channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-28650|2024-08-03T05:56:16.394Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2022.1.43700 it was possible to inject JavaScript into Markdown in the YouTrack Classic UI

item.title: CVE-2022-29929|2024-08-03T06:33:43.165Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2022.04 potential XSS via Referrer header was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-29813|2024-08-03T06:33:42.799Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 local code execution via custom Pandoc path was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-29930|2024-08-03T06:33:43.149Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: SHA1 implementation in JetBrains Ktor Native 2.0.0 was returning the same value. The issue was fixed in Ktor version 2.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2022-29818|2024-08-03T06:33:42.652Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 origin checks in the internal web server were flawed

item.title: CVE-2022-29821|2024-08-03T06:33:42.841Z -- jetbrains -- rider
item.description: In JetBrains Rider before 2022.1 local code execution via links in ReSharper Quick Documentation was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-40978|2024-08-03T12:28:42.951Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: The installer of JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.2.2 was vulnerable to EXE search order hijacking

item.title: CVE-2022-38133|2024-08-03T10:45:52.822Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2022.04.3 the private SSH key could be written to the server log in some cases

item.title: CVE-2022-29817|2024-08-03T06:33:42.813Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 reflected XSS via error messages in internal web server was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-37010|2024-08-03T10:21:32.474Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.2 email address validation in the "Git User Name Is Not Defined" dialog was missed

item.title: CVE-2022-28651|2024-08-03T05:56:16.316Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2021.3.3 it was possible to get passwords from protected fields

item.title: CVE-2022-28649|2024-08-03T05:56:16.466Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2022.1.43563 it was possible to include an iframe from a third-party domain in the issue description

item.title: CVE-2022-29819|2024-08-03T06:33:42.822Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 local code execution via links in Quick Documentation was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-29815|2024-08-03T06:33:42.657Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 local code execution via workspace settings was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-38179|2024-08-03T10:45:52.874Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: JetBrains Ktor before 2.1.0 was vulnerable to the Reflect File Download attack

item.title: CVE-2022-36322|2024-08-03T10:00:04.377Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2022.04.2 build parameter injection was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-29928|2024-08-03T06:33:43.306Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2022.04 leak of secrets in TeamCity agent logs was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-34894|2024-08-03T09:22:10.639Z -- jetbrains -- hub
item.description: In JetBrains Hub before 2022.2.14799, insufficient access control allowed the hijacking of untrusted services

item.title: CVE-2022-29814|2024-08-03T06:33:42.902Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 local code execution via HTML descriptions in custom JSON schemas was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-29035|2024-08-03T06:10:58.321Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: In JetBrains Ktor Native before version 2.0.0 random values used for nonce generation weren't using SecureRandom implementations

item.title: CVE-2022-28648|2024-08-03T05:56:16.455Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2022.1.43563 HTML code from the issue description was being rendered

item.title: CVE-2022-37009|2024-08-03T10:21:32.463Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.2 local code execution via a Vagrant executable was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-29812|2024-08-03T06:33:42.664Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 notification mechanisms about using Unicode directionality formatting characters were insufficient

item.title: CVE-2022-36321|2024-08-03T10:00:04.291Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2022.04.2 the private SSH key could be written to the build log in some cases

item.title: CVE-2022-29816|2024-08-03T06:33:42.690Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 HTML injection into IDE messages was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-37396|2024-08-03T10:29:21.005Z -- jetbrains -- rider
item.description: In JetBrains Rider before 2022.2 Trust and Open Project dialog could be bypassed, leading to local code execution

item.title: CVE-2022-38180|2024-08-03T10:45:52.879Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: In JetBrains Ktor before 2.1.0 the wrong authentication provider could be selected in some cases

item.title: CVE-2022-29927|2024-08-03T06:33:43.184Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2022.04 reflected XSS on the Build Chain Status page was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-29820|2024-08-03T06:33:42.663Z -- jetbrains -- pycharm
item.description: In JetBrains PyCharm before 2022.1 exposure of the debugger port to the internal network was possible

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2022.04.4 environmental variables of "password" type could be logged when using custom Perforce executable

item.description: In JetBrains Hub before 2022.1.14638 stored XSS via project icon was possible.

item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.2.34646 the Guest User Account was enabled for attaching files to articles

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.07 parameters of the "password" type could leak into the build log in some specific cases

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.07 access tokens could continue working after deletion or expiration

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.07 stored XSS was possible on the Code Inspection tab
